main event: A USAF pilot reported a UFO sighting in Green River, Utah in 1948.
interesting points: The report was made by a credible USAF pilot.
The sighting occurred in Green River, Utah in 1948.
The observed craft was described as cloud or smoke-like.
The report lacks details about the shape or specific identification of the craft.
The location of the sighting was near Company After Point 302.
